title: Weirdhouse Cinema: A Chinese Ghost Story
itunes:title: Weirdhouse Cinema: A Chinese Ghost Story
description:
In this episode of Weirdhouse Cinema, Rob and Joe discuss the 1987 Hong Kong supernatural romance comedy “A Chinese Ghost Story,” featuring screaming skulls, a seductive ghost and an evil tree demon. It’s a cult classic!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
